website_summaries.verdict: Takes only 20 minutes to install on screen door, with minimal tools. We like the larger dimensions of the flap opening and its wide swing arc.
pros: Features solid construction, not flimsy plastic parts
Will accommodate very large dogs, no jumping required
cons: Flap is dark, not easily seen by pets at night
Magnetic closure, but no locking mechanism
Pictographic instructions written in foreign language (Japanese)

customer_reviews.title: Great screen pet door
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and it took me about 20 minutes for the install. As long as you're installing it in the corner of the screen door where you can access both sides, it's easy enough for one person to do. The mounting process is very smart and very easy using only a screwdriver. I then used one of my sharp pocket knives to cut out the screen when I was done. Very basic. I ordered the Medium Large size and my 53 pound black lab got used to it quickly, using a few treats at first.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - installation instructions in Chinese tho
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!! My 35 lb border collie loves it and it’s lasted for 6 months so far. Packaging is horrible tho- everything in Chinese including instructions. Had to figure it out on my own and took a whole afternoon to install. Took a day to train the dog but it’s so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kkandkk

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised how hard it is to find a good pet door to install in a screen door
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how hard it is to find a good pet door to install in a screen door. I've tried the other smaller doors available on Amazon and very few stores, but even my corgi couldn't fit through, especially now that he's full grown. This door solved my issue. It was easy enough to install, and has held secure since last May, even having installed this quite close to some damaged parts of our screen. The only downside of this was the shipping, since there was no U.S. distributor available when I ordered this, but it was worth the wait for this thing to make it across the Pacific Ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Steffel

customer_reviews.title: Look for something else
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price and the time. If I did not already cut the whole in the screen I would DEFINITELY return it. The screws are extremely small and if you have a nice thick screen, it's almost impossible to connect the two pieces. I had to cut additional screen where the screws were supposed to connect. Luckily, I was able to secure the top corners which will hold it for.....some time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this door
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this door for our 50 lb dog, and now that it is installed and the dog is using it, we really like it. It was a little bit of a challenge to figure out which way to put the screws in (instructions are in Japanese) but learned that you position the screws in the larger size holes and screw through to the smaller size holes. Once we figured that out, it was simple to install, although it did take 2 people. Once installed, it is very sturdy and easy for the dog to figure out and use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does not include English instructions. There are illustrated instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not include English instructions. There are illustrated instructions on the package in Chinese. As others have said it is nearly impossible to mount with the included self tapping screws. Save yourself some time an aggravation and buy some 6-32 3/4 flat head screws and nylon lock nuts and drill the holes through the panels. The 3/4 inch screw when tight ends up nearly flush with the nut.
customer_reviews.author: Benton F Murphy III

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Need longer screws if you have pet screen.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality dog door and was fairly easy to install. As others have noted, if you have the pet screen (which I do), you have to get longer screws. But they were easy to find at the local hardware store and once we had the right length it went together without issue. The magnetic lock doesn't work real well ... even a small breeze can open it .... so if locking the door is important to you, this is not the one. But overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great door for screen doors
customer_reviews.text: My dog managed to tear a hole in the in-laws screen door...so we got this to solve 2 problems, to allow him in and out when he was visiting and to replace the hole. This worked great on both counts! I will say the door is an easy install, and it works great - allows you to have the scrrn door in place while allowing pets easy access. I will say the only drawback was a lack of instructions. However it is pretty self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Overall fairly decent.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for two years. Pin on the door finally snapped and broke. I always had a little trouble with the screws not holding, just a mm not long enough. The door frame still stayed in the screen with only 2/3 of the screws holding it. The magnets worked well for a long time until frame got a little bent then they didn't do anything to hold door.
customer_reviews.author: MTN

customer_reviews.title: The door itself is pretty good. The problem I had with it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The door itself is pretty good. The problem I had with it was the screws that hold the plastic parts in place. They are a tad short and as you are screwing them in, you have to be careful to not exert to much force or you will strip it out. I modified my door to accept bolts and nuts to hold it in place and that seems to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest purchase of my adult life
customer_reviews.text: This door changed my life. It has given me back my weekends. I always wanted a dog door, but didn't want them to have free reign when I wasn't home, but couldn't afford one with all the fancy locks on. This door was amazing. It took Mayne an hour to install, because there wasn't any instructions, bit I was able to figure it out. I had.it on for a year with two dogs running through it all the time (sometimes at the same time) and it's held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Easy to install, and blends into my screen door well. It also always stays closed since there are magnets on the bottom. My dog loves using it!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome door! I have an eight month old female ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome door! I have an eight month old female Golden Retriever that we trained to use the door since she was about six weeks old. She very quickly got the concept and goes in and out a dozen times a day, at least. Definitely a lifesaver for when we are gone all day as she can go outside and relieve herself without delay. At this point, she is 60lbs and is getting a bit big for the door, though.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this dog door
customer_reviews.text: It is holding up better than many reviews indicate. My door has been knocked off by my two labs maybe 5 times as many months. Nothing broke. Easily put back into place immediately without tools. I'm a female klutz and I installed the door myself! So, it can't be that confusing to do. I wholeheartedly recommend anyone to buy this door. It only gets 4 stars because of the door being knocked off.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Sing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We have had more dog doors in three last 24 years but this one is incredible. We have had it for about 7 months and still looks like new, which I'd not a big deal with a dog door I guess. Installed is less than 20 minutes right intimate our screen door. The dogs adapted to it immediately,. The only issue has been popping off of the flap itself. This is a very easy fix tho. Please don't hesitate if you are looking for one of these.
customer_reviews.author: harold perry

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This doggy door is the best thing ever for your pet baby. My schnauzer/poodle fits through it perfectly and uses it all the time. She has run through it at high speed in order to try to catch a squirrel and it has help through. Even when a huge Golden Retriever/ Poodle went through it, it held up great. Very easy to install on my own even though the instructions are in Japanese. Some others who have seen it have already bought it for their own pet babies. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoMommy

customer_reviews.title: No English instructions - Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and works good. I will only give 2 stars because of the lack of English instructions. The package included pictures and were clear and understandable but I feel if you're are going to sell product on Amazon, you should then supply packaging with English instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase. Besides taking a little longer than expected for delivery this pet door has been great. I wasn't sure which pet door to buy when I looked on Amazon. There are so many different products, different prices all with mixed reviews. There is no doubt that I made the right decision. It easily attached to my screen door. It was very easy to install even with the directions written in another language. Pictures worked fine. I really liked the idea of screwing the door together rather than having it snap together like the others. The door has worked perfect since day one.
customer_reviews.author: tsgolden10

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall. Seems fairly durable as welln as it has gotten plenty of use from our two beagles. Dinged for a star because I needed to use better hardware than what was supplied. I used larger screws since the ones provided were too small.
customer_reviews.author: VTMichael

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest but reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I guess this product could conceivably work but I found that too much of the door was attached to the screen and thus easily dislodged.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Plastic hinges broke
customer_reviews.text: The weak plastic tabs that serve as hinges on this thing broke after only a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Fried Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly as described. I installed myself by remaining bing the door first. Out 50lb dogs have no problems using it. Our 100lb hound can even fit through but it is tight. Unfortunately, our 13 year old lab can't manage it well. That however is not an issue with the product it is her age.
customer_reviews.author: j.American

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Screws were too short to work at all. Construction was awful. Instructions were in Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: sandstone1985

customer_reviews.title: Already bought a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I bought and returned 3 other dog doors before I found this one. It works great for my 40lb black lab - she loves it! Easy to install, and it seems I would be able to put it on a new door if I ever need to replace the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Carras

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works very nice. Expensive, but no regrets. Easy to assemble. Note the picture where the screws are attached. You should not have any left over screws. Install the screws snuggly, not tight as you may strip the plastic screw hole.
customer_reviews.author: HIM001

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog, Happy Family
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not the easiest install, but worth the effort. My 65lb Pit/Boxer mix uses the door all day long. He's happy with the independence to go in and out as he pleases. We're happy to not need the open the door constantly.
customer_reviews.author: CLR

customer_reviews.title: Works nice.
customer_reviews.text: Was simple to put on. Did not damage the existing screen. Be gentle when putting it on, because if you're not you can damage your screen. It does not come with written instructions in English. It has a picture instructions so anyone can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric  Williams

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable. Hinges are plastic, not metal, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable. Hinges are plastic, not metal, and instructions were in Japanese, but it's been durable for our 40 lb dog. As long as you remove the screen door, it's simple to install. Appreciated this solution of putting a dog door on sliding screen door when we didn't have space for a modular door (which would fit with the sliding glass door).
customer_reviews.author: Andres R Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things we have purchased in a while. This is easy to install, despite directions being in a foreign language. Our dogs love it and it makes our lives a lot easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it and it is not an eye sore
customer_reviews.text: This is the simplest doggie door you will find installing on screen doors! My dogs love it and it is not an eye sore. The only comment is the installation, which some of the holes are not aligning, thus it makes it harder to screw in. I think it's better to have a nut and screw but FLUSHED on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Leviste

customer_reviews.title: Pet dog door for screen door.
customer_reviews.text: This pet door was easy to install and works perfectly for our beagle. She loves going in and out, after getting used to it. Good quality and sturdy, yet lightweight enough to hang on the screen door.
customer_reviews.author: Ximena Hernandez-Cata

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This one works good. Sturdy. I tried cheaper ones and that's exactly what they were-cheap. The extra support by attaching it to the screen door frame made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the Quality
customer_reviews.text: Shocked at how well made this was. Installed very easily. Instructions were in Chinese but the pictures made it a no-brainer. Literally almost anyone could install this thing. My Dog is 20 lbs and I should have gotten a smaller size for her but this is nice for when friends bring their dogs over. Magnet seems to hold the door closed well unless the wind is ripping. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: ColeFL

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My 10 year old bichon took a little time, 3 weeks, but has figured it out. My 4 year old bichon figured it out immediately. I care for small dogs for a living and They are all using it!
customer_reviews.author: oliversees

customer_reviews.title: Heavier materials needed
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were mixed on this item and while the design made sense to me, the quality wasn't as expected as the magnets at the bottom corners didn't "grab" the door flap to hold it closed. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my dogs.fitted it in about 15 minutes.strong.i would recommend changing the mesh in your screen door ,to dog proof mesh.very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: everything was in Japanese on the packing, and do ...
customer_reviews.text: everything was in Japanese on the packing, and do not feel this product is worth $40, it screwing together rather than just snapping is what finally sold me. but still feel it is over priced
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, I did it myself before my husband got home. Light weight for my 30# rat terrier to use. Great product. Instructions were in Japanese, but the pictures were easy to follow. Shipping was fast 2-3 days as promised. The screws add a measure of trust that we didn't have with our previous product. Have no worries that it will fall off the screen with repeated use from our aggressive little terrier. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best decision I ever made .it is a bit expensive for the quality but my dogs love it .
customer_reviews.author: AMIT GARG

customer_reviews.title: Door installed easily. My dog is about 70lbs and fits through ...
customer_reviews.text: Door installed easily. My dog is about 70lbs and fits through just fine, cats have figured it out also. It's been in for about a month with no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Rivers

customer_reviews.title: but it's actually kind of easy..
customer_reviews.text: took me a while to figure what's the easiest way to install it all by myself, but it's actually kind of easy... good stuff ! my GSD learned it very quick even he doesn't really "like" it :P
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, dogs love the freedom I live not having ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, dogs love the freedom I live not having big gaping holes in my screen door from them tearing through it. Installation is a little tricky would have been helpful to have another set of hands(or) take the door off before installing, getting the two pieces to line up was the hardest part.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Landry

customer_reviews.title: Invest in your pet today. Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made love it. Put it in 2 screen doors
customer_reviews.author: Reverend C.

customer_reviews.title: My dog is so happy! He was first curious and scared
customer_reviews.text: My dog is so happy! He was first curious and scared, but I trained him a couple times with treats, and the he learned very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: COCONUT

customer_reviews.title: Pegs break- should sell replacement door
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this item a few times. We love the product but the door ( where the pegs fit into the frame) typically breaks. I buy a whole new one but would really enjoy if they sold a replacement door separately.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Boster

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good door once installed. Be very careful not to strip the screws.
customer_reviews.author: nini

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: our dogs slam through it and occasionally displace the screws
customer_reviews.author: P. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product. My Shiba Inu likes it very much! It brings lot convenience for him in & out to the backyard through the screen door. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jzhang

customer_reviews.title: With 2 people its fairly easy to install except the heads broke off the screws ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the pet door screen solved our problem. I was worried about size but our alaskan husky and queensland heeler have no problem using. With 2 people its fairly easy to install except the heads broke off the screws that were provided using manual screwdriver. We substituted a few of the screws and the rest was simple. One hour installation including rescreening the door.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K Luther

customer_reviews.title: It works great for the dog
customer_reviews.text: This has held up for a few weeks. It works great for the dog. My complaint is....when the wind blows, the dog door blows open letting so many BUGS into our home!
customer_reviews.author: LionOSU

customer_reviews.title: Our Pet Door came with only Chinese (? ) ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Pet Door came with only Chinese (?) writing and instructions. Installation was kind of self explanatory however and it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Skelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Door
customer_reviews.text: This dog door works great. We had someone else install it but he liked it so much he took the box so he could order it for his other customers.
customer_reviews.author: minpinmom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! Iv'e now had it for a year ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Iv'e now had it for a year and still as good as brand new. Great quality! It fits my golden doodle who is about 45 lbs and my Yorkie (8lbs).
customer_reviews.author: mrens

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked...
customer_reviews.text: Bad sizing. I have a very big lab and it doesn't fit him.
customer_reviews.author: maria diaz

customer_reviews.title: screen dog door
customer_reviews.text: Still have not been able to complete the install have two screws in place and unable to succeed in getting others in place. Two people are definitely required. The quality is poor, I got what the price was..cheapest :-\
customer_reviews.author: JPaige

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Screws that came with the door wouldn't thread so I had to use some I found around the house. Door is cheaply made and the magnets at the base of the door aren't near strong enough to keep the door closed. Not thrilled with this door but it's up now so we'll see how long it stays that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product for price
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it, great product for price. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be well built. It was easy to install. I took the screen door off and laid it down to install the dog door.
customer_reviews.author: microguy

customer_reviews.title: Works but brittany dog got it off the frame
customer_reviews.text: It works well - but brittany dog got the flap out of the frame and chewed one side a bit; struggling to find a replacement flap. Pity...
customer_reviews.author: TRACY

customer_reviews.title: Works well but screws not included
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works well door hinges need to be strong as the flap get knocked off on occasion. But why are screws not included???
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: It only took my dog one day to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: It only took my dog one day to figure out how to use the new door. We didn't install the plastic door that comes with this kit, we just cut the screen on the bottom and sides leaving a screen flap to cover the hole. This seems easier for the pups to go in and out, and still keeps bugs out for the most part
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and my dogs, small and medium size, are using it well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chang

customer_reviews.title: screws were NOT included
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with screws as stated and they are needed to keep door in place. After a trip to hardware store installed quickly. I found it easier to remove screen door, lay door on floor to install by myself. My 65lb and 13lb dogs both use it no problem. If you just have large dogs install the door higher from the ground. Because I have a min pin (13lb) I installed it even with the base frame;like the advertise pic with white dog in it.
customer_reviews.author: 300 joules

customer_reviews.title: What a great invention!
customer_reviews.text: What a great invention!! My husband installed this by himself pretty quickly. Dogs go in and out of door with ease.
customer_reviews.author: rier

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poor material, it was falling apart when trying to install it. Small Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Montoya-Ospina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! Easy to install!! Just would have liked it to have a locking feature..
customer_reviews.author: mary warren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beagles love it although it will blow open with the breeze off the lake.
customer_reviews.author: GJF

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install, easy for even my small dog to use, sturdier than you'd think.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad alternative for the price
customer_reviews.text: For what I needed it for it worked fine. It does stay on the screen well and it is lightweight which is good. It is nice that it screws in and it isn't just plastic that snaps together. The only issue I have is that it blends in to the screen making it hard for my dog to find it when it is dark. Considering the options it would still be my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: P. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Door
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exactly as described, and shipped fast! After searching for a perfect dog door for a few weeks, I ended up purchasing this one. Compared to literally ALL of the other sellers out there, this one seems to be of the highest quality with metal fastening screws (10+) instead of cheap plastic clips. It also has very thick door hinges compared to other flimsy plastic that bends and breaks over time. Very easy to put together and highly recommended. The only thing that I would like to see added to this product is a lock for the door! It would be nice for times when the gardeners are outside and I accidentally leave my sliding door open.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Easier life for my dog and whole family!!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my dog. So much easier life for the family and the dog!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey K

customer_reviews.title: ... extra screws to increase its rigidity but it works great and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Added a few extra screws to increase its rigidity but it works great and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse J.

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy installation to put up by myself but once the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not an easy installation to put up by myself but once the first screw is in the rest got easier. This is my first time getting a doggie door so nothing to compare it with but I won't hesitate to buy again if needed. It is just the right size for my husky.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install, and our dog is adjusting to it. Seems sturdy but magnets to keep door from swinging in the wind are not strong enough to achieve this. Also no locking mechanism 😔
customer_reviews.author: G. G. R

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It works very well for our 2 Manchester terriers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Door is good size for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Door is good size for my dog, and she used it easily. The little plastic hinge broke off of one side, and there is no way to repair it, so now the door won't stay on. Cheaply made, not happy that it broke so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: Tried installing this with 3 different types of screen, spent more money on screens trying to make this work than the product actually cost! The instructions were not in English even though it's pretty self explanatory but still wouldn't work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No lock, but still a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The screen in the lower panel of my Lanai screen door was ripped and coming out. Our dog was going in and out this way. I purchased and installed some heavier screening for the lower panel. Then I added the door to that screening and it works great. It actually stays in place rather well. Removed one star because there is no way to lock the door when we don't want our dogs using it. I did try to install a lock but it is not very secure. Whish it had a lock on it. Otherwise a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S. Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice door
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this door a couple years now. It’s solid. It’s easy to install. My dog thinks he’s a wizard because he can go through a screen door. I can’t say anymore than that.
customer_reviews.author: Teratronious

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year - and fixed often!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good size, and works with screen door Cons: Snap problem (as mentioned by others) makes installation difficult and have to augment with screws. My main issue is poor quality of door "hinge" which consists of tiny plastic extensions that fit into the frame. Therefore, the door kept bouncing out when the dogs ran through it, and finally, one of the tiny extensions broke off. Right now it's just an open area but it's not mosquito season yet. The hinge should be metal. Hasn't lasted a year. Still waiting for a decent pet door for screens!
customer_reviews.author: shortforu

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product! Installation is much easier than other products
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Installation is much easier than other products. More solid than other products! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: ricky koo

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it. I love that I don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. I love that I don't have to open the door ten times. Doesn't have a lock is my only disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: lisa sullivan

customer_reviews.title: doggy screen door
customer_reviews.text: all was as advertised, one screw hole was stripped but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W Casadonte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and sturdy. I've ordered two more for our other screen doors.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne K.

customer_reviews.title: Great door especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and our beagle, Lucy, just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Easy install even with 1 person
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! Easy install even with 1 person. Now all I have to do is get my dog to use it
customer_reviews.author: biketruckcar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install even with a thicker than normal screen
customer_reviews.text: 65lb Flat coated retriever goes in and out with no problem. Easy to install even with a thicker than normal screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: great!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as offer. Love it specially coz I didn't want to drill a hole in my door or wall.
customer_reviews.author: Yuly Pena Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy for what it is but works perfect and easy to install. Dogs use it daily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product. It is a little tricky to install ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It is a little tricky to install but it works well when installed.
customer_reviews.author: shaozhong li

customer_reviews.title: High priced PLASTIC CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to install. The predrilled holes did not match up and were impossible to line up. The door does not swing as freely as it should and it would be nice if it had some sort of a lock. It was terribly overpriced for what I received. Worst of all, the installation directions were in CHINESE! I cannot wait until most thi,'s say MADE IN AMERICA AGAIN! I would NEVER purchase this item AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: P Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Perfect size for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Perfect size for the dogs. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: I used different screws. Worked better for me.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not in English, but the pictures were pretty self explanatory. The screws that came with it were difficult to work with, and I ended up using some bigger ones that I already had. Now that it is up, and my cat understands what to do, it seems to work well. I would not consider myself handy, but I managed to install this. You probably can, too.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome for my crazy dogs running full speed out of ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for my crazy dogs running full speed out of the house for squirrels, birds, rabbits, other dogs, and road bikers. I did have to add a couple screws to reinforce the frame, but it's a great smart product rather than getting up everytime to let the dogs out and keeping the bugs away as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bagels

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Access
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great in "screen door" solution. It is reasonably priced and provides a good access solution for pets. However, it is important to mention that the instrunction are not in English. If you you are not handy and capable of figuring it out for yourself, this may be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: good so far
customer_reviews.text: works great on standard screen. My door had the pet proof steel grate on top of the screen so I had to get longer screws to make it work. Swings easily and the magnets stop it in the closed position when it swings back.
customer_reviews.author: boots

customer_reviews.title: ... and I just installed it and we are extremely happy with, it seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just installed it and we are extremely happy with, it seems very sturdy. We have 3 dogs and I was worried that our border collie wouldn't fit through it. We put it up a little higher so she wouldn't have to bend down too much and hit her back on the top of it but our 2 small dogs need to leap over it because it's a little too high for them but it worked out perfectly. We highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Dog wont use it.
customer_reviews.text: Good Product, easy to install. I only wish I could get my dogs to use it. They are afraid of the swinging door. My Cocker will come in but wont go out. My Silky Terrier, Forget it. just sits at the door and barks. I've tried treats, I've tried putting them in and out. If I hold it open, they will use it but that defeats the purpose. Any tips welcome.
customer_reviews.author: QtipC

customer_reviews.title: This is great --- a snap to install put it together and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great --- a snap to install put it together and had the dog going through it before I mounted it on the door after a few time doing that mounted it and the dog uses it every time with no problem. no more having to get up letting her out all the time It is GREAT !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ADT DX

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Trash. Had to return it. Poorly made and NO installstion instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

product_meta.title: TAKARA INDUSTRY Pet Dog Door for Screens, Medium/Large
product_meta.description: The title says "medium/large pet dog door", however because this is based on Japanese standards, please make sure to carefully check the size of the product before purchasing. Screened flap. Door opening: Height 13 5/8" x width 12 1/4". For pets including cats, small dogs, medium size dogs and medium/large dogs.
feature_bullets: Easy installation using screwdriver and box cutter
Uses stainless steel screws to securely attach frame to screen
Hinged flap with wide swing range and magnetic closure
Door Opening: Height 13 5/8 inch X Width 12 1/4 inch
